metadata.name: Legendary Jesse Owens
metadata.description: The icon and legend Jesse Owens "James Cleveland Owens" won four gold medals at the 1936 Olympic Games. The win changed and revolutionized atheletes especially for Africans and the world through the undeniable display of character by this legend on and off the track and making Hitler look like a small person. The pencil art was done by a young inspiring Nigeria pencil artist Victor Achineje.
